Description: Bronze vessel, with a hinged lid, shaped as the bust of a young woman. The base has been detached.
Bibliographic references: Bronze / Catalogue of the Bronzes in the British Museum. Greek, Roman & Etruscan. (1718)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 22 Oct-1998 30 Apr, Italy, Rome, Fondaione Memmo, Ancient Faces
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
